name: Spellbound Rollers
description:
A simple survival game where you have to defend yourself against living dice with your magic dice with several special powers: Fire, poison, ice etc... Collect the chips, gain XP and unlock more powers!

Controls

WASD - Move

Mouse - Aim

Left click - Fire

Right click - Dash

ESC - Pause

Enter - Select Option

Credits
